additional_buffs.description: Increases chance of [Undead's secret skill] even if Dark Archer is in the Time Shop. (6-star 1%, Max 30%).
additional_buffs.name: Undead Secret Skill

buffs.description: [Elevates the first stage after revival] can still activate even if Dark Archer is in the Time Shop (5-star 1%, 6-star 2.5%%, Max 60%).
buffs.name: Elevates the first Stage after the Revival

hidden_abilites: Even if Dark Archer is in the Time Shop, revives at the floor corresponding to #% of the current floor. (When in Time Shop, 2.5% bonus per 6-star and 1% per 5-star is applied. However, max revival floor buff cannot exceed 60%.)
Increases chance of Undead's secret skill. (Increased by 1% per 6-star for a maximum of 30%, and is applied even when in Time Shop.)
description.skill2: Increase attack power of undead unit in Guild Raid (4.2%, 8.4%, 12.6%, 16.8%, 21%)
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Dark Archer ]
